message: I'm offering a fair split - 95% for me, 5% for you. Let's be efficient and finish this quickly.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Time is money, and we're both losing out with every round.
Bob, I'm willing to move closer to your proposal. 55/45 split seems fair considering the inflation we're both facing. Let's end this quickly!
